title: Peanut butter and jam pinwheel cookies
ingredients: ['60g (2 oz) smooth raspberry jam', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '100g (3 1/2 oz) unsalted butter', '100g (3 1/2 oz) smooth peanut butter', '180g (6 1/2 oz) caster sugar', '1 large egg', '2 tablespoons full fat milk', '340g (12 oz) plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
